entry.title: Sunday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle this morning and early this afternoon. Rain beginning this afternoon. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:23 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 8:23 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023
